config: We are excited to announce a new services-filtering feature in the Justia Lawyer Directory!

What does the feature do? The new filtering feature allows Justia Lawyer Directory users to easily find lawyers who provide particular services in a practice area. For example, a user could filter business lawyers to find those who provide "mergers and acquisitions" services, or filter family lawyers to find those who offer "adoption" services.
A list of the services for different practice areas is available here.

How does it work if I have a Justia Premium Placement? If you have a Justia Premium Placement, your placement will appear in all the filtered searches for the services under that practice area. If you have a Justia Premium Placement for Personal Injury, for example, your Justia Premium Placement will also show up for personal injury services such as car accidents, truck accidents, and premises liability.
Take a quick peek at the feature here:

How do I make the most of this feature? Your profile will appear in the filtered search results for the services that you have selected. You can edit and select your services by editing your profile’s practice areas. As a courtesy, we have pre-populated your profile with all the service areas for the practice areas that you have listed.
If you’re not a Justia Premium Member, please feel free to respond to this email or call us at (888) 587-8421 to get more information.
We are excited to announce a new services-filtering feature in the Justia Lawyer Directory!

What does the feature do? The new filtering feature allows Justia Lawyer Directory users to easily find lawyers who provide particular services in a practice area. For example, a user could filter business lawyers to find those who provide "mergers and acquisitions" services, or filter family lawyers to find those who offer "adoption" services.
A list of the services for different practice areas is available here.

How does it work if I have a Justia Premium Placement? If you have a Justia Platinum Placement, your placement will appear in all the filtered searches for the services under that practice area. If you have a Justia Platinum Placement for Personal Injury, for example, your Justia Platinum Placement will also show up for personal injury services such as car accidents, truck accidents, and premises liability. Justia Platinum members, like yourself, will always remain as the top search results. Unlike Justia Gold members who rotate within the pages.
Take a quick peek at the feature here:

How do I make the most of this feature? Your profile will appear in the filtered search results for the services that you have selected. You can edit and select your services by editing your profile’s practice areas. As a courtesy, we have pre-populated your profile with all the service areas for the practice areas that you have listed.

Or if you have any questions call us at (888) 587-8421
to get more information.
